T02D2812:167a-0: @167a * // wa ti'i rgyud can gyi thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2812:167a-1: dkar bsil ro brgya bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab nyid kyi
T02D2812:167a-2: phyag / glang chen sna phub lta brgya'i cod pan
T02D2812:167a-3: gyis gtugs pa // ma lus sa stengs zhi ba bsgrub mdzad mchog gi bu //
T02D2812:167a-4: dpal ldan dpal chen spyan ras gzigs dbang nyid rtag 'dud //
T02D2812:167a-5: dgar dang mya ngan ha cang sdig mang dge ba sogs //
T02D2812:167a-6: 'gyur ba'i las kyi dbang po gang yin de gzhan 'gyur //
T02D2812:167a-7: de tshe lha mchog wa ti'i rgyun 'bebs dus gsum du //
T02D2812:167b-0: nyin dang mtshan mo rnam pa @167b kun du mi g-yeng bsgom //
T02D2812:167b-1: de la rgyun 'bab pa ni gnyis te /
T02D2812:167b-4: yid kyi las can ni mtshan mo la'o //
T02D2812:167b-5: dngos po'i las ni nyin par ro //
T02D2812:167b-6: gang na 'jug ngogs bde zhing dri ngad ldang ba me tog ljon shing g-yur za bas mdzes par /
T02D2812:167b-7: nyid kyi phyag dpung pa tshun chad yongs su rdzogs pa'am //
T02D2812:167b-8: mkhrig ma'i bar du yang rung ste /
T02D2812:167b-9: de lta bu'i gzugs gdu bu dang sor gdub la
T02D2812:167b-10: sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang bcas
T02D2812:167b-11: te / mdog bzang pos bsgyur la /
T02D2812:167b-12: zla ba nya ba dang nyi ma shar ba'i dus gang rung la rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D2812:167b-13: me tog char dang bdug pa'i sprin gtibs rol mo 'brug sgra cher bsgrags shing //
T02D2812:167b-14: ba dan rnga yab glog gi rgyun 'khrigs ro bzangs zhal zas kyis mchod de //
T02D2812:167b-15: bar snang 'gro bas phrin las rjes bstod tshangs dbyangs nga ros dril bsgrags la //
T02D2812:167b-16: rdo rje dril sgrogs dgyes pa'i gar bskyod rdo rje dga' bas bro gar dbul //
T02D2812:167b-17: de nas yi ge gsum sngags kyis //
T02D2812:167b-18: byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyun phab pa'i //
T02D2812:167b-19: padmo'i phyag gis ming med kyi //
T02D2812:167b-20: rtse nas legs bstar snying po btung //
T02D2812:167b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i dang po dang //
T02D2812:167b-22: dag byed dri med bde ba che //
T02D2812:167b-24: rnam dag 'od gsal rmad yin no //
T02D2812:167b-25: ji lta ji ltar spyi gtsug nas //
T02D2812:167b-26: rgyun 'bab de la de ltar ni //
T02D2812:167b-27: skal pa bzang po'i lus ngag yid //
T02D2812:167b-28: dri bral mi mnyam mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D2812:167b-29: gzhan dag phongs pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D2812:167b-30: phun sum tshogs min gang gyur pa //
T02D2812:167b-31: de dag kyang ni skad cig gis //
T02D2812:167b-32: spang gyur 'thungs pa tsam gyis so //
